Let's learn some words used in the bank.
The bank statement shows your balance and transactions.
I put my jewelry in the safety deposit box.
Her bankbook shows that her account is empty.
Bank tellers can count money quickly.
Don't waste your money. Consult a financial planner.
The bank will conduct a credit check before your loan gets approved.
Electricity, gas and water are utilities.
Why is my phone bill so big?
The bank vault contains millions of dollars.
